channel.title: I need urgent help with drop rates, and drops in general
channel.description:
Ok guys, I have made a topic before close to this, but I found out error. I don't know what I have done at all, but I tried to edit the drops and drop rate on the KBD, and just KBD, but it has litterly stopped droping ANYTHING, other than charms, and charms only. Also this doesn't only apply to KBD, for some reason other Dragon's seem to be affected by this too.. Any help PLEASE? If you suggest putting a code in or anything, put the code in, where I should put it, and under what file. Also, I have 5 "NPCDROP" folders..Why? I have 3 ".TSM" 1 ".java" and 1 ".cfg" Help anyone? Thanks ! Will rep.
I am using Project Insanity, Torvapkz source

item.title: I need urgent help with drop rates, and drops in general
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

It’s in npcdrops.tsm
I’ll show you an example.

#Nomad 8528:20 443:2000 533:200 264:40 1437:4000 258:40 5304:10 5304:5 5304:12 12158:20 12159:20 12160:20 12163:1 6686:20 1373:1 1289:1 1149:1 9244:250 1754:200 1201:1 1319:1 454:500 565:500 995:150000 452:30 452:50 1514:700 3025:25 3024:5 268:40 830:50 384:500 13362:1 13358:1 13360:1 13355:1 13352:1 13354:1 13348:1 13346:1 13350:1
8528 is the npc. 20 is the drop rate.
therefore you get 8528:20, meaning every 20 or so kills you get a rare drop. Make sure you use tabs when you put drops in between other drops.
Also, where you see like 443:2000, it means this: 443 is the itemid, 2000 is the amount.
The top row is the normal drops, and the bottom row is the rare drops.

Read full topic
item.source: I need urgent help with drop rates, and drops in general

item.title: I need urgent help with drop rates, and drops in general
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

okay.
what did you do? XD

i’d recomend replacing the files you edited with the ones from the archive and trying again, this time, following the tut more closely.

changing drops and shit are only read by .CFG, it’s really basic.

the KBD is actually the first thing in my drops.cfg.

/npcdrop = (NPCID) (ITEMID) (ITEMAMOUNT) (CHANCE)/

/*King Black dragon*/ npcdrop = 50 1747 1 100 npcdrop = 50 4675 1 2 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 15 npcdrop = 50 1149 1 2 npcdrop = 50 2577 1 2 npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3 npcdrop = 50 536 1 100 npcdrop = 50 1601 5 1 1

just edit it in there, you shouldn’t have like five folders.

Read full topic
item.source: I need urgent help with drop rates, and drops in general
